body: Job descriptionAs a back-end engineer who works remotely, you work on a social application in enterspise scale; analyze it and start to develop it from scratch and actively think about the future of our system in a highly skilled and professional Scrum-team. You work in a young, positive, result-driven remotely and always you will work with the latest technologies; Top-notch PHP Frameworks, noSQL DBMS, Git, CI, Ticketing system, web servers as Ngnix, cloud infrascructure, Varnish, Unit testing.Job responsibilities- Anyalizing requirments of the project and start to define project models- Designing database scheme for project based on big-data approches- Implement application in a DDD manner- Identify and communicate best practices for back-end engineering- Write and maintain quality back-end code- Participate in the Scrum team and code reviewsThis is a remote job opportunity.Â
title: Remote PHP Developer
